nodes.text: Tango Three was the callsign used in the Starfighter Corps of the Galactic Empire. One TIE fighter pilot under the callsign Tango Three, along with a second pilot, pursued Han Solo in the Millennium Falcon as he attempted to transport Grakkus the Hutt to a Rebel Alliance holding facility on Akiva. In order to trick Grakkus into revealing the location of his safe house, Solo surrendered to the Imperial pilots, landing on a nearby asteroid. Tango Three and several other pilots boarded the Falcon, but were killed.
